ygData.subject: Re: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: ... But at level 30??  This is viable for a level 35+, I just don t see how someone 5 levels below the monster can get much to stick, if anything at all.
ygData.messageBody:
>and they're likely to kill a lot of people as you run
>around trying to get charm to stick. I suppose North
>and West Karana is broad and unpopulated enough to do
>this reasonably safely.

But at level 30?? This is viable for a level 35+, I
just don't see how someone 5 levels below the monster
can get much to stick, if anything at all.

Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
